TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SoapMessageStage extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 消息的处理阶段。

span.span: Specifies the processing stage of a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供了一种扩展机制来调用 Web 服务使用 SOAP。ASP.NET provides an extensibility mechanism for calling Web Services using SOAP. 扩展性机制围绕，可以检查或修改在客户端或服务器上处理的消息中的特定阶段的消息。The extensibility mechanism revolves around a that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. 此枚举指定的处理阶段。This enumeration specifies the processing stage of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 SOAP 扩展，该实现扩展的一段方法。The following code example is a fragment of a SOAP extension, which implements the method. 在方法，处理处理特定于。Within the method, processing of a is handled specific to the . [!code-cpp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CPP/SoapMessageState.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CS/soapmessagestate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/VB/soapmessagestate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterDeserialize = int32(8)

summary.span: 恰好在将 从 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象之后的阶段。

span.span: The stage just after a is deserialized from a SOAP message into an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间后包含来自 XML Web 服务方法调用的响应的 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象，但在客户端接收的反序列化的结果之前处理，AfterDeserialize 阶段发生。During processing, the AfterDeserialize stage occurs after the SOAP message containing the response from an XML Web service method invocation has been deserialized into an object, but prior to the client receiving the deserialized results. 期间后包含表示 XML Web 服务方法调用的 SOAP 消息的网络请求反序列化为对象，但之前对该对象表示 XML Web 方法处理，AfterDeserialize 阶段发生调用服务方法。During processing, the AfterDeserialize stage occurs after a network request containing a SOAP message representing an XML Web service method invocation is deserialized into an object, but prior to the method on that object representing the XML Web service method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterSerialize = int32(2)

summary.span: 恰好在序列化 之后，但在通过网络发送 SOAP 消息之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just after a is serialized, but before the SOAP message is sent over the wire.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间处理，AfterSerialize 阶段之后发生客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法和参数序列化为 XML，但在 SOAP 之前包含该 XML 消息通过网络发送。During processing, the AfterSerialize stage occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method and the parameters are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network. 期间处理，AfterSerialize 阶段之后发生 XML Web 服务方法返回和任何返回值序列化为 XML，但在 SOAP 之前包含该 XML 消息通过网络发送。During processing, the AfterSerialize stage occurs after an XML Web service method returns and any return values are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeDeserialize = int32(4)

summary.span: 恰好在将 从通过网络发送的 SOAP 消息反序列化到对象之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just before a is deserialized from the SOAP message sent across the network into an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间后未收到来自 XML Web 服务方法调用的网络响应，但之前包含 SOAP 响应消息反序列化为对象处理，BeforeDeserialize 阶段发生。During processing, the BeforeDeserialize stage occurs after the network response from an XML Web service method invocation has been received, but just before the response containing the SOAP message is deserialized into an object. 期间后收到包含的 XML Web 服务方法调用的 SOAP 消息的网络请求时由 Web 服务器，但之前正在反序列化为对象的 SOAP 消息处理，BeforeDeserialize 阶段发生。During processing, the BeforeDeserialize stage occurs after a network request containing the SOAP message for an XML Web service method invocation is received by the Web server, but prior to the SOAP message being deserialized into an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeSerialize = int32(1)

summary.span: 恰好在序列化 之前的阶段。

span.span: The stage just prior to a being serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间处理，BeforeSerialize 阶段发生的客户端调用 XML Web 服务方法之后，但在正在序列化的调用之前。During processing, the BeforeSerialize stage occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method, but prior to the invocation being serialized. 期间处理，BeforeSerialize 阶段发生后调用到 XML Web 服务方法返回时，但之前的返回值进行序列化并通过网络发送回客户端。During processing, the BeforeSerialize stage occurs after the invocation to the XML Web service method returns, but prior to the return values being serialized and sent over the wire back to the client.
